poemsDataJson.list_full: きりぎりす 鳴(な)くや霜夜(しもよ)の さむしろに 衣(ころも)かたしき ひとりかも寝(ね)む
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In my cold bed,//Drawing close my folded quilt,//I sleep alone,//While all through the frosty night//I hear a cricket's lonely sound.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Kirigirisu|Naku ya shimo-yo no|Samushiro ni|Koromo kata shiki|Hitori kamo nen
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ころもかたしき ひとりかもねむ
poemsDataJson.author: 後京極摂政前(ごきょうごくせっしょうさきの) 太政大臣(だいじょうだいじん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 寒い霜夜のひとり寝のわびしさ
